title: Women of Aibom: in the time before before
creator_credit: Department of Information and Extension Services and Boris Cook
brief_description: The making of clay pots is very important for the women of Aibom. Itm is their means of barter for the food which is grown in other villages. The methods of making, decorating and firing the pots are shown.
